Translations.Text: Oebbi Isse$li d aman, seg igenni. Issader yissen akal, deffir tmeppant is. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud isellen
Ih, ameyyez, i kunwi, di lmal. Nesswa kwen s wayen illan deg ufwad nnsen, ger lfert d idamen, i$i iufan, aeidan i wid itessen
Si ppemoa n tezdayin akked tfeooant, teppawim d ayen iuuekoen, akked ooezq igerzen. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ifehmen
Iweeea Mass ik i tzizwa: "gemt ixxamen deg durar, di ttjuo, di te$woasin
Sinna, eccemt si yal ppemoa. Ddumt s wannuz, iberdan n Mass nnkwent. Iteffe$ ed seg iaabbav nnsent ayen tessen, n yal ini, degs eellu i imdanen". Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ipxemmimen
Ixelq ikwen Oebbi, sinna, ad awen Iddem ooue. Kra, segwen, ad ccerfeffen mavi, alamma ur ppissinen acemma mbaad ma ssnen. Ih, Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Aeernuk
Oebbi Ismenyaf ad I$it kra i wiyav. Wid Ismenyaf, ur ilaq ara ad rren, ooeeq nnsen, i waklan nnsen, d$a ad aadlen yidsen. Day ara nekoen l$it n Oebbi
Iga yawen Oebbi, seg iman nnwen, tilawin nnwen. Ifka yawen, si tlawin nnwen, arraw d warraw n warraw. Ioeeq ikwen s wayen ilhan. Day ad amnen di tkerkas, ad nekoen l$it n Oebbi
